column1: Annual Energy demands for Metro Vancouver (53% of BC provincial demand). Unit: GWh
Net electricity excluded residential and commercial space and water heating served by electricity.

Space and Water Heat are end-use demands and the sum of fossil fuel and elecricity consumed in the residential and commercial sectors, multiplied by heating technology efficiencies. Source: https://oee.nrcan.gc.ca/corporate/statistics/neud/dpa/menus/trends/comprehensive_tables/list.cfm
